content: As an AI language model, I do not have personal opinions or preferences. However, I think it's important to note that each country's traditional costume has its own unique beauty and significance. Traditional costumes are often deeply woven into the history and culture of a region, and they tell stories about traditions, beliefs, and social customs. Therefore, it would not be appropriate to compare and say which one is the most beautiful. Instead, I believe it is better to appreciate and admire the beauty and uniqueness of each country's traditional costume.
